fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Cover a Town member's house in snow to melt another player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Covering a Town member's house in snow deals an Overkill attack to them and allows you to deal an Unstoppable attack to your second target.
- If you attempt to cover a non-Town member's house in snow, you will cover your own house in snow instead. You may also choose to cover your house in snow normally.
- If you melt a Town member, you can only cover your own house in snow for the rest of the game.
- You cannot keep a last will due to your practices being forbidden.
- If Jd is in the game, you may melt them without penalty, and you may cover their house in snow regardless of their role.
